title: Massive Real Photo Postcard Collection George Burke photos 4300+ ACCEPTING OFFERS
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: Massive Real Photo Postcard Collection George Burke photos 4300+ ACCEPTING OFFERS
posts.post_content: Large collection of 4300+ different real photo postcards featuring the photography of George Burke. Players represented are from 1929-1948. Postcards were produced from original Burke negatives. Please note these postcards were not produced by Burke. They were produced between the 1960s-1990s with a majority being done in the 1990s. This is the lifetime collection of one collector and includes all the star postcards, nothing pulled from the collection. Includes multiple images of Babe Ruth, Ted Williams, Lou Gehrig, Joe DiMaggio, Lefty Grove, Dizzy Dean, etc, etc, etc.  All postcards were produced on Kodak Postcard Paper. $2900.00 or MAKE OFFER- PayPal Friends & Family, Check/MO ....Please PM me with any questions.  Thank you.  Jim

any pictures of the backs? any stamped with year?

Great group!

Thanks Jimmy

Hi Jimmy,

The backs are all Kodak Postcard backs.  None have been post marked. Most do have the player name neatly written on the back.
